title: Koi wa Ameagari no You ni (After the Rain)
synopsis: Akira Tachibana, a reserved high school student and former track runner, has not been able to race the same as she used to since she experienced a severe foot injury. And although she is regarded as attractive by her classmates, she is not interested in the boys around school.
characters: ['Tachibana, Akira', 'Kondou, Masami', 'Nishida, Yui', 'Kujou, Chihiro', 'Kyan, Haruka', 'Kase, Ryousuke', 'Yoshizawa, Takashi', 'Yuuto', 'Yamamoto', 'Kyan, Shouta']
